entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 7.O RTM Error #28373
  • Consider creating and publishing a package for FrameworkReference resolution #28364
  • Dependent projects building to same output dir fail to Rebuild #28355

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.1xx] Disable msbuild server by default #28369
    Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28366
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28367
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to 7.0.2xx for loc build #28304
    Area-Infrastructure
  • normalize accessibility when not including internal symbols #28348
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add warning when targeting 7.0 in 17.3 and remove 7.0 from the list of supported targets #28224
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add missing EnableRuleAttributesMustMatch task property #28338
    Servicing-approved, Area-ApiCompat, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Update branding to 6.0.111 #28322
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add RuntimeSpecific #28376
    Area-External
  • Fix checking for updated workload packs in advertising manifests #28327
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • Baseline Update for 6.0.306 #28346
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2013867 #27667
  • Read PackageDefinitions and PackageDependencies from the cache assets file instead of ResolvePackageDependencies #28263
    Area-Infrastructure
  • revert perma-escaping of semicolons and support semicolon-delimited unquoted property values #27859
    Bug, Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, DO NOT MERGE, 6.0.11
